dc_description_s: THIS DATASET CAN ONLY BE USED ON CAMPUS.    World Elevation (On Campus Access Only) is an ESRI .lyr file referencing a raster theme representing elevations worldwide.  This dataset is comprised of data from the Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) between latitudes 60 degrees North and 56 degrees South at a resolution of 3 arc seconds (90 meters).  The remaining polar regions are comprised of data from the Global Digital Elevation Model (GTOPO30) at a resolution of 30 arc seconds (+- 1 Km).  In total this dataset is comprised of 12 tiles that have been merged into a raster catalog.
dc_creator_sm: United States. National Aeronautics and Space Administration
